properties.tune: St. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: We're Jabal al-Samira's Mercenary Band. We hope you will enjoy our show. Jabal al-Samira's Mercenary Band We'll help you make your evening go. Jabal al-Samira, Jabal al-Samira, Jabal al-Samira Mercenary Band.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: It's wonderful to be here, It's certainly a thrill, You're such a lovely audience, Your ransom we'll take home with us, Your ransom we'll take home.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I don't really want to stop the show, But we thought you really ought to know, To escape us, you must pay a fee, Call it ransom money if you please.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Now may I introduce to you, The head of our conspiracy, al-Samira's Mercenary Band. Pay your FEES!
